Sentencas: It is a challenge to find the optimal amount of water steam to be added to the fuel in a biogas-fueled solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: A correlation for optimal steam-to-fuel ratio in a biogas-fueled solid oxide fuel cell with internal steam reforming by using Artificial Neural Networks

Sentencas: An under-optimal steam fraction impedes steam reforming reactions, while an over-optimal steam fraction reduces SOFC performance due to a fuel shortage.
Titulo: A correlation for optimal steam-to-fuel ratio in a biogas-fueled solid oxide fuel cell with internal steam reforming by using Artificial Neural Networks

Sentencas: Water production inside the cell, as a result of electrochemical reactions, and the carbon deposition issue rises the complexity of the problem.
Titulo: A correlation for optimal steam-to-fuel ratio in a biogas-fueled solid oxide fuel cell with internal steam reforming by using Artificial Neural Networks

Sentencas: The main novelty of the current study is to propose a mathematical correlation for the optimal steam-to-biogas ratio as a function of operating temperature and biogas composition using a 3D simulation-trained Artificial Neural Network (ANN).
Titulo: A correlation for optimal steam-to-fuel ratio in a biogas-fueled solid oxide fuel cell with internal steam reforming by using Artificial Neural Networks

Sentencas: This correlation can be simply used without having to study the complex phenomena inside the biogas-fueled SOFC.
Titulo: A correlation for optimal steam-to-fuel ratio in a biogas-fueled solid oxide fuel cell with internal steam reforming by using Artificial Neural Networks

Sentencas: The results indicate the optimal steam-to-fuel ratio is highly dependent on the temperature and biogas methane content; that is, for a temperature range of 873K-1273K and a biogas CH4/CO2 range of 0.82-3, the optimal steam-to-fuel ratio varies within a range of 0.3-1.3.
Titulo: A correlation for optimal steam-to-fuel ratio in a biogas-fueled solid oxide fuel cell with internal steam reforming by using Artificial Neural Networks

Sentencas: It is also observed that the optimal steam-to-fuel ratio decreases with temperature, but increases with the biogas methane content.
Titulo: A correlation for optimal steam-to-fuel ratio in a biogas-fueled solid oxide fuel cell with internal steam reforming by using Artificial Neural Networks

Sentencas: The ANNproduced correlation shows a good agreement with the simulation results and can be reliably used by engineers.
Titulo: A correlation for optimal steam-to-fuel ratio in a biogas-fueled solid oxide fuel cell with internal steam reforming by using Artificial Neural Networks
